m_szDocTitle: Hybrid SUV Unveiled by Great Wall Motors (Could Be Sold Beyond China) | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Hybrid SUV Unveiled by Great Wall Motors (Could Be Sold Beyond China) May 14th, 2012 by Zachary Shahan     China’s got a booming car industry, and it’s increasingly looking to export its companies’ cleantech products, so it seems viable that Great Wall Motors’ new Hybrid SUV could cross borders. We’ll see. For now, here’s more on the topic from Jo Borras: China vs. the World:  Great Wall Unveils Global SUV (via Gas 2.0 ) Among certain circles in America, there is a growing fear of the Chinese.
